entry.title: Railway Rover: Western Europe's Railways
entry.summary: This Railway Rover episode now approaching takes a look at continental Europe's railways, particularly in western Europe. We're joined by Ambroise, a resident of Belgium, to introduce you to the railways across the (English) Channel and highlight some key comparisons. We discuss everything from the…
entry.content:
This Railway Rover episode now approaching takes a look at continental Europe's railways, particularly in western Europe. We're joined by Ambroise, a resident of Belgium, to introduce you to the railways across the (English) Channel and highlight some key comparisons.

We discuss everything from the train operating companies themselves to the rolling stock and those double decker trains unheard of across the UK. This is a particularly insightful episode for anyone interested in the railways across Europe.

TrainFan World on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCcFN...

Available to listen on all main podcast streaming services.
